assets/scripts/vendor/bootstrap_btn_checkbox.js
$(function () { $.fn.btn_checkbox = function (options) { return $(this).each(function () {

Settings

var $widget = $(this), $button = $widget.find('button'), $checkbox = $widget.find('input:checkbox'), color = $button.data('color'), settings = { on: { icon: 'fa fa-check-square-o' }, off: { icon: 'fa fa-square-o' } };

Event Handlers

$button.on('click', function () { $checkbox.prop('checked', !$checkbox.is(':checked')); $checkbox.triggerHandler('change'); updateDisplay(); }); $checkbox.on('change', function () { updateDisplay(); });

Actions

function updateDisplay() { var isChecked = $checkbox.is(':checked');

Set the button's state

$button.data('state', (isChecked) ? "on" : "off");

Set the button's icon

$button.find('.state-icon') .removeClass() .addClass('state-icon ' + settings[$button.data('state')].icon);

Update the button's color

if (isChecked) { $button .removeClass('btn-default') .addClass('btn-' + color + ' active'); } else { $button .removeClass('btn-' + color + ' active') .addClass('btn-default'); } }

Initialization

function init() { updateDisplay();

Inject the icon if applicable

if ($button.find('.state-icon').length == 0) { $button.prepend('<i class="state-icon ' + settings[$button.data('state')].icon + '"></i> '); } } init(); }); } $('.btn-checkbox').btn_checkbox(); });
